content: is there such a thing as  contacts matrix?

In general terms, a "contacts matrix" can refer to a system or tool that provides an organized representation of contact information. It is commonly used in businesses or organizations to keep track of various contacts, their roles, and their relationships with others. This may include details such as names, phone numbers, email addresses, job titles, departments, or any other relevant information. The format and structure of a contacts matrix can vary depending on the needs and preferences of the entity using it.
